ChartService
service in module npn-viz-tool

Description

Handles data gathering in a generic fashion for visualizations that should share, rather than duplicate such logic.

Methods

  • approxY(leastSquaresCoeff, x)

    Generate an approximate value for y based on the least squares coefficient and a known x.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    leastSquaresCoeffArray

    the coefficient array.

    xnumber

    The value for x.

  • getObservationDates(params, success)

    Issue a request for observation. Common parameters will be implicitly added like networks in the base filter or lists of sites if geographic filtering is enabled.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    paramsObject

    Parameters to send to the web service.

    successfunction

    The success callback to receive the response data.

  • getSizeInfo(marginOverride)

    Get common info about how a chart should be sized with respect to actual window size.

    Note: This method will result in information about how to statically size an image within a visualization dialog. However d3 can dynamically deliver width/height information for an SVG if full height/width is desired. E.g. 

    var width = parseFloat(svg.style('width').replace('px','')),
    height = parseFloat(svg.style('height').replace('px',''));
    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    marginOverrideobject

    Allows for overriding of defaults.

  • getSummarizedData(params, success)

    Issue a request for summarized data. Common parameters will be implicitly added like networks in the base filter or lists of sites if geographic filtering is enabled.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    paramsObject

    Parameters to send to the web service.

    successfunction

    The success callback to receive the data, "suspect" and "imprecise" data (if told to do so) will be implicitly filtered from the result.

  • getVisualizations()

    Get the coded list of visualization definitions.

    Returns
    Array

    The visualization definitions for use by the UI control.

  • isFilterEmpty()

    Convenience shortcut to FilterService.isFilterEmpty.

  • leastSquares(xSeries, ySeries)

    Perform leastSquares regression mathematics for drawing regression lines.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    xSeriesArray

    the x-series

    ySeriesArray

    the y-series

  • openSingleStationVisualization(station_id, vis)

    Open a visualization dialog focused on a single station.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    station_idstring

    The station id.

    visobject

    The visualization object.

  • openVisualization(vis)

    Open a visualization dialog.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    visobject

    The visualization object.

Properties

  • ONE_DAY_MILLIS

    constant for the number of milliseconds in a day.
